title: Introducing: Black Girl Gone
description:
Hello everyone! We would like to introduce you to Black Girl Gone a true-crime podcast that tells the stories of missing and murdered Black women and women of color in America. Host Amara tells the stories of missing women and solved and unsolved murders weekly. Some of these cases you may have heard before but many of them you have not. Amara tells these stories with a focus on who these women were before they became victims while exploring the crimes and circumstances that took their lives. Black Girl Gone is helping to bring light to stories that often get left in the dark.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
